author: admin
title: South Africans ask Nigerians to leave their country - NAIJ.COM
text: South Africans ask Nigerians to leave their country - NAIJ.COM NAIJ.COM Amid the report of xenophobic attacks on Nigerians in South Africa, citizens of the country have asked Nigerians to leave, accusing them of destroying their country. South Africa has had a reputation of attacking foreigners with reports of looting and â€¦
